name: DuckDuckGo Darker and Cleaner
additional_info:
A mash-up of the following two styles.  Many thanks to the authors Thermalzombie and iStyle

Set DDG background to #222

https://userstyles.org/styles/94905/duckduckgo-dark
https://userstyles.org/styles/101809/duckduckgo-clean

Use with these DDG settings:
https://duckduckgo.com/?kae=d&kp=-1&kn=1&kl=us-en&kv=l&kad=en_US&kak=-1&kj=000000&k7=000000
